attr.title: The Night Shift
attr.desc: Prevent the walking dead from escaping the graveyard and put them back to rest. Keep the job and save the innocents.
attr.inst: Download at itch.io https://icydog.itch.io/the-night-shift and place the NightShift.exe into the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download at [itch.io](https://icydog.itch.io/the-night-shift) and place the NightShift.exe into the gamedata folder.
